price: 181. Nabii Shuqeybi keenik iyych: sinaamah tu-elle keexxan keelá duudusaay, keexó daggoysa mara makkina.
arabic: ۞ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡسِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: awfū al-kayla walā takūnū mina al-mukh'sirīna
